title: The Lost Temple
description: Rumors have been circulating about a long-abandoned temple deep in the heart of the forest. Brave adventurers, seek out this ancient ruin and uncover its secrets.
reward: A magical amulet granting +10% to spellcasting ability

title: The Lost Temple
description: Rumors have been circulating about a long-abandoned temple deep in the heart of the forest. Brave adventurers, seek out this ancient ruin and uncover its secrets.
reward: A magical amulet granting +10% to spellcasting ability

title: The Cursed Mines
description: The mines have been plagued by a series of mysterious accidents. Investigate the source of these troubles and put an end to them.
reward: A suit of enchanted plate armor

title: The Secret Garden
description: A beautiful garden hidden away in the city's most affluent neighborhood. Rumors say that a rare and exotic flower blooms within its walls.
reward: A vial of enchanted bloom dust

title: The Haunted Mansion
description: A foreboding mansion on the outskirts of town has been plagued by ghostly apparitions. Put an end to the haunting and claim your reward.
reward: A magical staff granting +20% to intelligence

title: The Missing Heirloom
issuer: Lady Victoria, Matron of the Family
description: A priceless family heirloom has gone missing. Find it and return it to its rightful owner.
reward: A golden locket granting +15% to charisma
